posts.post_content:
Hello everyone.  I know it is not going to happen but the Christmas season being the season of miracles I am looking for a N172 Scott Stratton Louisville.  If anyone has one please message me at [url]wacturner@hotmail.com[/url] or through the board.  I live in Kentucky and I promise it will be the centerpiece of my small collection for a lifetime.  As always thanks for the help

Tony
